name: Jenkins Dark Ocean
description:
A dark theme for Jenkins, covering the Blue Ocean view but completely compatible with the normal view.
No inverted colours: green means success!
additional_info:
Release notes:
  • v1.2: (2018-11-12) Added a few more elements, including the header for aborted jobs
  • v1.1: (2018-06-25) Improved specificity for some problematic elements
  • v1.0: (2018-06-15) Initial version
